text: Ezɨ Sairus 3plan azenibar kantri Persian atrivim itima, God akam aghurigha Daniel ganɨngi. Danielɨn ziar mam Beltesasar. Ezɨ akar kam bar guizbangɨra, egha mong bar pɨn kozɨ, an osemegha ghaze, a manmaghɨn a gɨfogham?10:1 Hibrun akam deragha vezɨn kamɨn mɨngarim abɨghizir puvatɨ. Ezɨ God irebamɨn an gun mɨgei.
